Desc.eng: We have a problem. The noise of the generator attracted the attention of the monsters in the tunnels. They are moving against the Lair.
That is bad news indeed. I wasn’t looking for another fight just yet.
Fortunately the Lair is surrounded by several defense outposts which all have trap networks. We could lure the monsters to one of those.
Good idea. I’ll do just that. (Play tower defense)
I’ve got bigger fish to fry. Send some of our guards to man the outpost.
